what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: ConstrainedKDE R package performing kernel density estimation moment constraints. allows users fit kernel density estimation model, predict densities moments, visualize results using constrained KDE. URL GitHub (.e., source code) : https://github.com/SZ-yang/ConstrainedKDE URL Pkgdown webpage : https://sz-yang.github.io/ConstrainedKDE/

title: Plot the fitted density for the constrained KDE model — plot_constrained_kde_density
Plot the fitted density for the constrained KDE model — plot_constrained_kde_density
code: set.seed(42) n <- 100 x <- c(rnorm(0.5 * n, 0, 1), rnorm(0.5 * n, 1.5, 1/3)) h <- 0.6 model <- fit_constrained_kde(x, h) x_seq <- seq(min(x) - 1, max(x) + 1, length.out = 1000) p1 <- plot_constrained_kde_density(model, x_seq) print(p1)

code: set.seed(42) n <- 100 x <- c(rnorm(0.5 * n, 0, 1), rnorm(0.5 * n, 1.5, 1/3)) h <- 0.6 model <- fit_constrained_kde(x, h) p2 <- plot_constrained_kde_weights(model) print(p2)
